basics.label: Senior Business Development Manager
basics.summary: Experienced sales executive focused on helping others unlock their untapped potential. Provides clients with expert, trustworthy, candid, and objective business advice which results in better decision making. Known for industry thought leadership, integrity, ethics, values, and personal learning.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Field sales role responsible for both direct client contract value retention as well as growth through contract expansion and the introduction of new products and services. The territory for this role includes specific major client accounts within State of California government and carries a sales quota of $1.25 million+. Activities include consultation with C-level executives, account management, internal sales processes, account planning and territory management, and coaching and mentorship of junior sales AEs.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Similar responsibilities to those of Business Development Manager , with elevated quota and account management expectations. Also responsible for chairing ESI's Salesforce.com Governance Council. Also played a key role in selling and overseeing a major IT project management consulting services engagement with the State of California, one of the largest of its kind in ESI's 30-year existence.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Responsible for growing ESI revenues and annual quota attainment by selling project management, contract management, and business analysis training / professional services to large military and state/local government entities in the western US and Pacific Rim.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Responsible for leading the SkillRamp sales team in growing IT technical certification and training program revenues to Fortune 1000 corporations and large government clients in California, Nevada and Arizona.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Owner/Partner with Las Vegas business, focusing on direct client relationships for IT technical certification and training programs to major corporate and government clients. Successes included a dramatic increase in sales and market share acquisition

awards.title: 2011 Government Sales Contributor of the Year
2008 Business Development Manager of the Year
